overview: Girls don't love Gao Dashuai. He's short, ugly, forty years old. And he is too kind-hearted to make money. Gao has his own game company but in debt. Gao put the money into a film project but producer ran away with money.  With producer's ex-girlfriend who was cheated with money too, Gao begin to search deceiver
title: Stand On Tiptoe To Love You
